data.name: Buluk Mayan Warfare
data.detailed_description:
Use Sword and Magic against your enemies in this Aztec/Mayan themed Hack n Slash. 4 weapon styles, research spells, craft weapons and armor using resources gained from conquered cities. Rise through the ranks of the Mayan Military with your customizable warrior.





Become the Nacom, an Elite Mayan warrior who wields magic and weapons. Lay waste to Conquistadors, Mayan, and Aztec enemies.



The Nacom has multiple weapon styles to defeat their enemies. Macuahutil, Spear, Greatsword, and Knife. Or choose from a number of spells to unleash devastating magic upon your enemies. Master Fire, Wind, Water, Lightning, and many more Spells.



Research spells, craft weapons and armor using resources gained from conquered cities.
Rise through the ranks of the Mayan Military with your customizable warrior.

1521, the Mayan world stands on the brink of collapse. Peace between the Yucatan tribes continues to fracture while foregin invaders lay siege to the Aztec Empire. Tensions between our Tribe, the Tutul Xiu of Uxmal and the Cocom tribe of Tulum have escalated into all out war. Only a lone Hero stands between us and destruction.

data.supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Latin America*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 1700 Eight-Core Processor 3.00 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 580
  • Storage: 25 GB available space

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
